bullets.text: 2025 Shared National Credit review flags underwriting and monitoring risks in large syndicated loans, underscoring potential credit deterioration for big-bank and nonbank exposures.
Justice Department probe of Fed Chair Powell heightens perceived political pressure on monetary policy, raising uncertainty around Fed independence and future policy decisions.
Markets show a 'Sell America' tilt: dollar weakens and gold surges as investors price institutional risk tied to Fed attacks and governance concerns.
Fed officials signal limited urgency for near-term rate cuts, even as prominent investors argue policy should move toward ~3% to reduce growth and refinancing strain.
Proposal to cap credit-card APRs around 10% risks disrupting bank lending models; enforcement is unclear and could tighten consumer credit while pressuring bank earnings.
Trump threatens 25% tariffs on any country trading with Iran, elevating secondary-sanctions risk and increasing odds of oil price spikes if supply or shipping is disrupted.
U.S.-Venezuela escalation highlights limits of U.S. plans for Venezuelan oil and exposes reliability questions around Russian-supplied air defenses after reported missile failures.
Apple selects Google’s Gemini for Siri and on-device AI features, signaling a major platform partnership that reshapes mobile AI competition and expands Google’s model distribution.
Alphabet reaches $4 trillion market cap, reflecting investor concentration in AI leaders and expectations of monetization from cloud, search, and model ecosystem leverage.
Meta plans 10–15% Reality Labs cuts while launching new AI infrastructure efforts; cost discipline and capital intensity remain central to its AI/VR strategy.
OpenAI’s Torch acquisition accelerates push into healthcare data workflows, intensifying competition with Anthropic and big tech to own clinical AI tooling and compliance-ready platforms.
Research identifies an early brain signal linked to Alzheimer’s risk, implying potential for earlier screening and larger future demand for diagnostics and preventive therapeutics.
